title: Cannot connect to any game post champ select
body:
Both my F4ZE and D12fast accounts (on the OCE server) cannot connect to any of my games at all post champ-select screen. I have tried running the Hextech repair tool, flushing my dns, port forwarding, resetting routers, Restarting and PC and LOL and even disabling firewall to no avail. The problem appeared exactly 17 hours from now when i was playing my 8th ranked placement game on my F4ZE acc when i suddenly disconnected. I could not reconnect to that game at all and thus got a leaverbuster strike and a loss. I tried playing another game and got through the champ select phase, but again it could not connect to the game and got another loss on my ranked placements. I have scoured the forums which spoke of similar issues all the way back from 2014 so this isn't a completely new problem.

The only thing i haven't tried is completely reinstalling LOL, but i think that wont work. If this is a server side issue i really hope you guys can fix it as i have trie

replies.body: It sounds like there might be something blocking your connection from being able to reach the EUNE game servers. Let's check for anything along your connections route that could be giving it a difficult by running a traceroute. Grab a tool like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a trace to 31.186.224.42. Paste the results here for me to take a look at!

Hi Broporo, I haven't tried connecting to the EUNE servers, I'm back in the Pacific so i played on my OCE accounts. I just tried to play a game using a different ISP and it actually got through and i managed to play a whole game. So the problem has been identified to be something wrong with my ISP. Nonetheless I ran a traceroute to 31.186.224.42 and the results are as follows:

Keep in mind this traceroute was run while i was still on the problem ISP (the one which wouldnt let me play a LoL game). Port forwarding is disabled as I have to constantly update the port forwards with the new reassigned ip addresses everytime I restart my pc or my router. 

If i can know exactly what my ISP is doing to prevent me from playing a game, I can confront them with it. Im already in the process of changing ISPs as well as I am getting barely playable connections on my Steam games as well.

Yeeeaaaa that looks like your connection is having a really hard time trying to get to our servers, from that trace route your network is never able to actually reach us at all which is why you can't get connected. The best first step is a pretty simple one, let's try power cycling your network and modem really quickly to make sure everything is working properly there. Hit me back up and let me know how that goes after testing it in a custom game!

Just power cycled the modem and network and tried a custom game, still got the same issue. Did a traceroute to the same ip address as before and still got the same results.

Well snap! We may need to take a closer look into what's going on with your network, so go ahead and hit our tech guys up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Use our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to gather some log files that our techies can use to see what the main issue is.
